about_the_game:
My name is Seo-Seunghan.

As always, I refused to go to school and locked myself in my house.

But...here is an uninvited guest who burst into my room.

"What are you doing, bro?"

Seo-Ah-rim, starting with this little devil girl,

My uneventful daily life began to break down.

 

And the deaf girl, Yu-Sua

She depend on me weirdly after accidentally saving her.

 

An overwhelming amount of favor.

And yet what makes me hesitate,

"The Truth from 5 years ago" that only Yu-Sua doesn't know.

Two girls and I, who are in the same place.

We met again at the same place at the same time.

 

Different memories, different minds.

Like five years ago, we're going to do same things again,

Can we truly look at the same thing and hope for the same thing?

 

Overview

Our 4:33 is a game that pursues a mysterious yet bitter atmosphere.

It doesn't feel fancy or grand, but if you like silent and calm mystery novels, please enjoy this game.

Key Features

• Visual Novel with no choice

Unlike other visual novels, Our 4:33 have no endings or choices to choose. This game will show you what really happened in another reality that's different from where we live.

• A fairytale-like illustration

The atmosphere of Our 4:33 is like a dream. In dream, everything is lively like real life but also miracles happen like fantasy. Unique flavor illustrations will bring you the atmosphere well.

• Full voice dubbing

The voices of all the characters except the male protagonist were recorded by the voice actors. Excellent acting is like a miracle, which will plunge you into our dreamy world in Our 4:33.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features violence, murder, suicidal thoughts, sexual violence without mutual consent and metaphorical sexual expressions, including elements that, though not explicitly, may offend players. Please be aware if you are a person with a weak mind or may be affected by the above topics.

name: 우리들의 4분 33초

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: FHD Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: FHD Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: "Maybe...we all are deaf." This is a sweet-bitter story based on modern times. Also, this is a visual novel game with simple menu and using click or space bar to play, without no choice. Although, this game is not a simulation game only for love.
